title: BONUS EPISODE: Damon Wayans On Stand-Up & Upcoming New York Shows
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Legendary comedian Damon Wayans joined Ebro in the Morning for an insightful and entertaining conversation about his career, being recognized more about his stand up, his thoughts on young comedians and much more! 

He also discusses his son, Damon Wayans JR. and the untapped potential he possesses that hasn't been shown to the world yet. Other topics include his thoughts on Dave Chappelle, the Verzuz challenge that went viral, Will Smith and the slap heard around the world, Paul Mooney, the legacy of 'In Living Color', characters he would like to portray and more! 

He will be performing at Caroline's On Broadway Thursday, June 14! For more information visit: https://www.carolines.com/

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
